title: PBL-JAS Social Inquiry Project for Enhancing Critical Thinking and Creativity

context.prior_knowledge: Basic social concepts understanding and acquisition of fundamental inquiry methods
context.additional_context: A course cultivating critical thinking and creative problem-solving through real-case analyses of local community issues, with smartphone-based data collection and collaboration in resource-limited tech environments.

learning_goals: Learners demonstrate critical thinking skills to analyze causes of social issues from multiple perspectives with over 80% accuracy.
Learners complete three or more project deliverables presenting creative ideas at four-week intervals.
Learners improve their inquiry process two or more times based on peer evaluations and instructor feedback.

resources: Basic Measurement Tools (Thermometer, Tape Measure, etc.)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
